book.synopsis: Slaughterhouse-Five, an American classic, is one of the world’s great antiwar books. Centering on the infamous firebombing of Dresden, Billy Pilgrim’s odyssey through time reflects the mythic journey of our own fractured lives as we search for meaning in what we fear most.
book.title_long: Slaughterhouse-Five: A Novel (Modern Library 100 Best Novels)
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.47 Pounds, Width: 0.65 Inches
